body: Well... she turned into a slut way too quickly imo, and i know a lot of you (all of you...) are gonna disagree with me. I prefer slow, methodical corruption as opposed to the 'flip-of-a-switch' thing going on.
This artist related to shindol? The style and content feels almost exactly shindol
well, It's kinda unique... Who would agree when your mother change its gender?
The mother should have pregnated her tbh lol, more of a funny ending, A sequel with the mother this time more female gender bender needed lol
I wonder who the father is...
Even if I don't know what they are saying I know a terrible ending when I see one!
That form of the mother turned father is just so wrong with the dress and all.. make me want to puke.
Incest and then she gets pregnant by the same old dude? wtf, i think that's why they have weird bodies, doing all these taboo sex
